meta.description: CSH labels for the Question table of WEC Assessment

languageKey.label: Determines the order in which the questions appear in the Frontend.
Enabling the Hide field will prevent the assessment question (and any associated recommendations) from displaying in the Frontend.
Select a category to associate the question with. All questions must be tied to a category.
Put the question itself in this field.

You can weight the score of individual questions differently by changing the default (1) to another number. A weight of 2 means that when the question is scored, the answer receives twice as much emphasis as a question weighted as 1.
As assessment questions are answered in the Frontend, the average score for the question will be displayed here. This allows for the gathering and analysis of significant statistics.
